Description:
Allows searching for cards using filters!  Use the two top buttons to toggle where you want the cards to spawn and whether you want to spawn all new cards or filter the cards already placed in your target zone.

The syntax for a filter statement is: xyz, where x is your filter of choice, y is your operator, and z is your specifier.

Filters:
y = cycle
f = class
k = traits
o = cost
w = willpower icons
c = combat icons
i = intellect icons
a = agility icons
d = wild icons
t = type
p = level
z = slot
v = permanent (don't use a specifier for this one, just the operator!)
u = uses
q = special criteria (try 'heals_horror', 'heals_damage', or 'parley')

Operators:
: = equal to
! = not equal to
> = greater than (not applicable for y, k, t, or v)
< = less than (not applicable for y, k, t, or v)

Use the specifiers that make sense for each filter.  Remember to use numeric specifiers for '>' and '<' !

Filter statements can be chained together using the and (&) and or (|) operators.  Furthermore, parenthesis are fully supported in order to create more complex and specific filter statements.  Keep in mind the '&' and '|' operators have no strict precedence, so rely on parenthesis when order of operations is important.
Name: Custom_Token
